body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, printer. Virginia native. Married to Sarah Wailey Pike in Highland County, Ohio, on July 26, 1839. Father of William Pike, Medill Pike, Margaret Pike, Cordelia Pike, Charles Pike and Amanda Pike. Publisher in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Mason County in 1850. Printer in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1860.
